result.answer_text:
```javascript
Here's the execution of the plan in Python: ```python # Define the list to be sorted numbers = [64, 34, 25, 12, 22, 11, 90] # Sort the list using Python's built-in sorted function sorted_numbers = sorted(numbers) # Return the sorted list sorted_numbers ``` The sorted list is: `[11, 12, 22, 25, 34, 64, 90]`
```
